entry.tran: 使（自己或身体某部位）受伤
entry.def: If you hurt yourself or hurt a part of your body, you feel pain because you have injured yourself.

example.ex: Yasin had seriously hurt himself while trying to escape from the police...
example.tran: 亚辛试图从警察手中逃脱时受了重伤。

example.ex: He had hurt his back in an accident.
example.tran: 他在一次事故中伤了后背。

entry.def: If a part of your body hurts, you feel pain there.

example.ex: His collar bone only hurt when he lifted his arm.
example.tran: 他的锁骨只有在抬臂时才感觉到痛。

entry.def: If you are hurt, you have been injured.

example.ex: His comrades asked him if he was hurt...
They were dazed but did not seem to be badly hurt.
example.tran: 他们有些神志不清，但看起来没有受重伤。

entry.def: If you hurt someone, you cause them to feel pain.

example.ex: I didn't mean to hurt her, only to keep her still...
example.tran: 我不是故意要弄痛她，只是想让她别乱动。

entry.def: If someone hurts you, they say or do something that makes you unhappy.

example.ex: He is afraid of hurting Bessy's feelings...
example.tran: 他怕伤害了贝茜的感情。

example.ex: She's afraid she's going to be hurt and that she'll never fall in love again...
example.tran: 她害怕自己会受到伤害，从而永远不会再恋爱了。

entry.def: If you are hurt, you are upset because of something that someone has said or done.

example.ex: He gave me a slightly hurt look.
example.tran: 他有点受伤地看了我一眼。

entry.def: If you say that you are hurting, you mean that you are experiencing emotional pain.

example.ex: I am lonely and I am hurting.

entry.tran: 危害;损害;妨碍;对…产生不良影响
entry.def: To hurt someone or something means to have a bad effect on them or prevent them from succeeding.

example.ex: The combination of hot weather and decreased water supplies is hurting many industries...
example.tran: 炎热的天气和供水的减少正危及很多行业。

example.ex: They may fear hurting their husbands' careers.
example.tran: 她们可能担心对丈夫的事业造成损害。

entry.def: A feeling of hurt is a feeling that you have when you think that you have been treated badly or judged unfairly.

example.ex: ...feelings of hurt and anger, fear and despair...
example.tran: 伤心、愤怒、恐惧、绝望的复杂情感

example.ex: I was full of jealousy and hurt...

entry.def: If you say 'It won't hurt to do something' or 'It never hurts to do something', you are recommending an action which you think is helpful or useful.

example.ex: It wouldn't hurt you to be a bit more serious.
example.tran: 认真一点对你没有坏处。

means.word_mean: 1. a symptom of some physical hurt or disorder;

sentences.sentence: "the patient developed severe pain and distension"
